mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.strf_id AS strfId, SP.pic_name AS strfPic, A.title AS festTitle, IF(NOW() BETWEEN A.start_at AND A.end_at, 1, 0) AS isOpen, A.start_at AS startAt, A.end_at AS endAt, LD.detail_title AS locationTitle, CASE WHEN TU.user_id = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS priority FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest A LEFT JOIN strf_pic SP ON SP.strf_id = A.strf_id INNER JOIN location_detail LD ON A.location_detail_id = LD.location_detail_id LEFT JOIN location L ON LD.location_id = L.location_id LEFT JOIN trip_location TL ON TL.location_id = L.location_id LEFT JOIN trip T ON T.trip_id = TL.trip_id LEFT JOIN trip_user TU ON TU.trip_id = T.trip_id AND TU.user_id = #{userId} WHERE A.category = 'FEST' AND NOW() < A.end_at ORDER BY priority DESC, ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.start_at, NOW())) ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT A.strf_id AS strfId, SP.pic_name AS strfPic, A.title AS festTitle, IF(NOW() BETWEEN A.start_at AND A.end_at, 1, 0) AS isOpen, A.start_at AS startAt, A.end_at AS endAt, LD.detail_title AS locationTitle FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest A LEFT JOIN strf_pic SP ON SP.strf_id = A.strf_id INNER JOIN location_detail LD ON A.location_detail_id = LD.location_detail_id LEFT JOIN location L ON LD.location_id = L.location_id LEFT JOIN trip_location TL ON TL.location_id = L.location_id LEFT JOIN trip T ON T.trip_id = TL.trip_id LEFT JOIN trip_user TU ON TU.trip_id = T.trip_id WHERE A.category = 'FEST' AND NOW() < A.end_at ORDER BY ABS(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, A.start_at, NOW())) ASC LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT L.location_id AS locationId, L.title AS locationTitle, L.location_pic AS locationPic, COUNT(TL.location_id) AS tripedCnt FROM location L LEFT JOIN trip_location TL ON TL.location_id = L.location_id GROUP BY L.location_id, L.location_pic ORDER BY tripedCnt DESC LIMIT 10

WITH CategoryData AS ( SELECT A.category, A.strf_id AS strfId, A.title AS strfTitle, SP.pic_name AS strfPic, LD.detail_title AS locationName, IF(EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM wishlist W WHERE W.strf_id = A.strf_id AND W.user_id = #{userId}), 1, 0) AS wishIn, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(RV.rating) FROM review RV WHERE RV.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS averageRating, COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wishlist WL WHERE WL.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS wishCnt, inquired_at FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest A LEFT JOIN location_detail LD ON LD.location_detail_id = A.location_detail_id LEFT JOIN recent R ON R.strf_id = A.strf_id LEFT JOIN strf_pic SP ON SP.strf_id = A.strf_id WHERE R.user_id = #{userId} AND A.category IN ('STAY', 'RESTAUR', 'TOUR') AND R.undo_recent = 0 ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM CategoryData CD WHERE category = 'STAY' ORDER BY inquired_at DESC LIMIT 6 ) AS StayData UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM CategoryData WHERE category = 'RESTAUR' ORDER BY inquired_at DESC LIMIT 6 ) AS RestaurData UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM CategoryData WHERE category = 'TOUR' ORDER BY inquired_at DESC LIMIT 6 ) AS TourData

SELECT DISTINCT A.strf_id AS strfId, A.title AS strfTitle, CONCAT(L.title, ' ', LD.detail_title) AS locationTitle, A.category, SP.pic_name AS strfPic, CONCAT(LEFT(A.detail, 12), '...') AS `explain`, COUNT(W.strf_id) AS wishCnt, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(RV.rating) FROM review RV WHERE RV.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS averageRating, COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(R.strf_id) FROM recent R WHERE R.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS recentViews FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest A LEFT JOIN location_detail LD ON LD.location_detail_id = A.location_detail_id LEFT JOIN location L ON L.location_id = LD.location_id LEFT JOIN strf_pic SP ON SP.strf_id = A.strf_id LEFT JOIN wishlist W ON W.strf_id=A.strf_id WHERE A.category !='FEST' GROUP BY A.strf_id, A.title ORDER BY wishCnt DESC, averageRating DESC , recentViews DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT DISTINCT A.strf_id AS strfId, A.title AS strfTitle, CONCAT(L.title, ' ', LD.detail_title) AS locationTitle, A.category, SP.pic_name AS strfPic, CONCAT(LEFT(A.detail, 12), '...') AS `explain`, COALESCE((SELECT AVG(RV.rating) FROM review RV WHERE RV.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS averageRating, COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(R.strf_id) FROM recent R WHERE R.strf_id = A.strf_id), 0) AS recentViews, COUNT(W.strf_id) AS wishCnt FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest A LEFT JOIN location_detail LD ON LD.location_detail_id = A.location_detail_id LEFT JOIN location L ON L.location_id = LD.location_id LEFT JOIN strf_pic SP ON SP.strf_id = A.strf_id LEFT JOIN wishlist W ON W.strf_id=A.strf_id WHERE L.location_id IN ( SELECT TL.location_id FROM trip_location TL JOIN trip T ON T.trip_id = TL.trip_id JOIN trip_user TU ON TU.trip_id = T.trip_id WHERE TU.user_id = #{userId} AND NOW() < T.end_at ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM `schedule` C JOIN sche_memo D ON D.schedule_memo_id = C.schedule_id JOIN trip_user E ON E.trip_id = D.trip_id WHERE C.strf_id = A.strf_id AND E.user_id = #{userId} ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM wishlist W WHERE W.strf_id = A.strf_id AND W.user_id = #{userId} ) AND A.category !='FEST' GROUP BY A.strf_id, A.title ORDER BY wishCnt DESC, averageRating DESC , recentViews DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT T1.name, T1.profile_pic AS profilePic, T1.couponCnt, T2.tripId, T2.locationPic, T2.title , T2.dDay FROM ( SELECT U.user_id, U.name, U.profile_pic, COUNT(C.coupon_id) AS couponCnt FROM `user` U LEFT JOIN receive_coupon RC ON RC.user_id = U.user_id LEFT JOIN coupon C ON C.coupon_id = RC.coupon_id LEFT JOIN used_coupon UC ON UC.receive_id = RC.receive_id WHERE U.user_id = #{userId} AND UC.receive_id IS NULL AND NOW() < C.expired_at ) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TU.trip_id as tripId, TU.user_id, T.title, L.location_pic AS locationPic, CASE WHEN T.start_at < NOW() THEN -1 ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE(T.start_at), NOW()) END AS dDay FROM trip_user TU JOIN trip T ON T.trip_id = TU.trip_id JOIN trip_location TL ON TL.trip_id = T.trip_id JOIN location L ON L.location_id = TL.location_id WHERE TU.user_id = #{userId} AND T.end_at > NOW() ) T2 ON T1.user_id = T2.user_id ORDER BY dDay
